rows.arabic: يُسَبِّحُ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ لَهُ ٱلْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ ٱلْحَمْدُ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
rows.translation: All that is in the heavens and all that is in the earth glorifieth Allah; unto Him belongeth Sovereignty and unto Him belongeth praise, and He is Able to do all things.
rows.transliteration: yusabbiḥu lillāhi mā fis samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ ۖ lahul mulku walahul ḥamd ۖ wahuwa `alā kulli shay-in qadīr

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.

rows.arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكُمْ فَمِنكُمْ كَافِرٌ وَمِنكُم مُّؤْمِنٌ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ
rows.translation: He it is Who created you, but one of you is a disbeliever and one of you is a believer, and Allah is Seer of what ye do.
rows.transliteration: huwal ladhī khalaqakum faminkum kāfirun wa minkum mu-min ۚ wallāhu bimā ta`malūna baṣīr

rows.arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَصَوَّرَكُمْ فَأَحْسَنَ صُوَرَكُمْ ۖ وَإِلَيْهِ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
rows.translation: He created the heavens and the earth with truth, and He shaped you and made good your shapes, and unto Him is the journeying.
rows.transliteration: khalaqas samāwāti wal-arḍa bil ḥaqqi waṣawwarakum fa-aḥsana ṣuwarakum ۖ wa ilayhil maṣīr

rows.arabic: يَعْلَمُ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تُسِرُّونَ وَمَا تُعْلِنُونَ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
rows.translation: He knoweth all that is in the heavens and the earth, and He knoweth what ye conceal and what ye publish. And Allah is Aware of what is in the breasts (of men).
rows.transliteration: ya`lamu mā fis samāwāti wal-arḍi waya`lamu mā tusirrūna wa mā tu`linūn ۚ wallāhu `alīmun bidhātiṣ ṣudūr

rows.arabic: أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ نَبَؤُا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن قَبْلُ فَذَاقُوا۟ وَبَالَ أَمْرِهِمْ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
rows.translation: Hath not the story reached you of those who disbelieved of old and so did taste the ill-effects of their conduct, and theirs will be a painful doom.
rows.transliteration: alam ya-tikum naba-ul ladhīna kafarū min qablu fadhāqū wabāla amrihim walahum `adhābun alīm

rows.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُۥ كَانَت تَّأْتِيهِمْ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ فَقَالُوٓا۟ أَبَشَرٌ يَهْدُونَنَا فَكَفَرُوا۟ وَتَوَلَّوا۟ ۚ وَّٱسْتَغْنَى ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَنِىٌّ حَمِيدٌ
rows.translation: That was because their messengers (from Allah) kept coming unto them with clear proofs (of Allah's Sovereignty), but they said: Shall mere mortals guide us? So they disbelieved and turned away, and Allah was independent (of them). Allah is Absolute, Owner of Praise.
rows.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahu kānat ta-tīhim rusuluhum bil bayyināti faqālū abasharun yahdūnanā fakafarū watawallaw ۚ wastaghnallāh ۚ wallāhu ghaniyyun ḥamīd

rows.arabic: زَعَمَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَن لَّن يُبْعَثُوا۟ ۚ قُلْ بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّى لَتُبْعَثُنَّ ثُمَّ لَتُنَبَّؤُنَّ بِمَا عَمِلْتُمْ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٌ
rows.translation: Those who disbelieve assert that they will not be raised again. Say (unto them, O Muhammad): Yea, verily, by my Lord! ye will be raised again and then ye will be informed of what ye did; and that is easy for Allah.
rows.transliteration: za`amal ladhīna kafarū an lan yub`athū ۚ qul balā warabbī latub`athunna thumma latunabba-unna bimā `amiltum ۚ wadhālika `alallāhi yasīr

rows.arabic: فَـَٔامِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَٱلنُّورِ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنزَلْنَا ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌ
rows.translation: So believe in Allah and His messenger and the light which We have revealed. And Allah is Informed of what ye do.
rows.transliteration: fa-āminū billāhi warasūlihi wan nūril ladhī anzalnā ۚ wallāhu bimā ta`malūna khabīr

rows.arabic: يَوْمَ يَجْمَعُكُمْ لِيَوْمِ ٱلْجَمْعِ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلتَّغَابُنِ ۗ وَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِٱللَّهِ وَيَعْمَلْ صَـٰلِحًا يُكَفِّرْ عَنْهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِۦ وَيُدْخِلْهُ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
rows.translation: The day when He shall gather you unto the Day of Assembling, that will be a day of mutual disillusion. And whoso believeth in Allah and doeth right, He will remit from him his evil deeds and will bring him unto Gardens underneath which rivers flow, therein to abide for ever. That is the supreme triumph.
rows.transliteration: yawma yajma`ukum liyawmil jam` ۖ dhālika yawmut taghābun ۗ wa man yu-min billāhi waya`mal ṣāliḥan yukaffir `anhu sayyi-ātihi wayudkhilhu jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā abadā ۚ dhālikal fawzul `aẓīm

rows.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
rows.translation: But those who disbelieve and deny Our revelations, such are owners of the Fire; they will abide therein - a hapless journey's end!
rows.transliteration: wal ladhīna kafarū wakadhhabū bi-āyātinā ulā-ika aṣ-ḥābun nāri khālidīna fīhā ۖ wabi-sal maṣīr

rows.arabic: مَآ أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِٱللَّهِ يَهْدِ قَلْبَهُۥ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
rows.translation: No calamity befalleth save by Allah's leave. And whosoever believeth in Allah, He guideth his heart. And Allah is Knower of all things.
rows.transliteration: mā aṣāba min muṣībatin illā bi-idhnillāh ۗ wa man yu-min billāhi yahdi qalbah ۚ wallāhu bikulli shay-in `alīm

rows.arabic: وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱلرَّسُولَ ۚ فَإِن تَوَلَّيْتُمْ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَىٰ رَسُولِنَا ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
rows.translation: Obey Allah and obey His messenger; but if ye turn away, then the duty of Our messenger is only to convey (the message) plainly.
rows.transliteration: wa-aṭī`ullāha wa-aṭī`ur rasūl ۚ fa-in tawallaytum fa-innamā `alā rasūlinal balāghul mubīn

rows.arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ
rows.translation: Allah! There is no Allah save Him. In Allah, therefore, let believers put their trust.
rows.transliteration: allāhu lā ilāha illā huw ۚ wa`alallāhi falyatawakkalil mu-minūn

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِنَّ مِنْ أَزْوَٰجِكُمْ وَأَوْلَـٰدِكُمْ عَدُوًّا لَّكُمْ فَٱحْذَرُوهُمْ ۚ وَإِن تَعْفُوا۟ وَتَصْفَحُوا۟ وَتَغْفِرُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
rows.translation: O ye who believe! Lo! among your wives and your children there are enemies for you, therefor beware of them. And if ye efface and overlook and forgive, then lo! Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū inna min azwājikum wa-awlādikum `aduwwal lakum faḥdharūhum ۚ wa in ta`fū wataṣfaḥū wataghfirū fa-innallāha ghafūrun raḥīm

rows.arabic: إِنَّمَآ أَمْوَٰلُكُمْ وَأَوْلَـٰدُكُمْ فِتْنَةٌ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌ
rows.translation: Your wealth and your children are only a temptation, whereas Allah! with Him is an immense reward.
rows.transliteration: innamā amwālukum wa-awlādukum fitnah ۚ wallāhu `indahu ajrun `aẓīm

rows.arabic: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا ٱسْتَطَعْتُمْ وَٱسْمَعُوا۟ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ وَأَنفِقُوا۟ خَيْرًا لِّأَنفُسِكُمْ ۗ وَمَن يُوقَ شُحَّ نَفْسِهِۦ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
rows.translation: So keep your duty to Allah as best ye can, and listen, and obey, and spend; that is better for your souls. And whoso is saved from his own greed, such are the successful.
rows.transliteration: fattaqullāha mas-taṭa`tum wasma`ū wa-aṭī`ū wa-anfiqū khayral li-anfusikum ۗ wa man yūqa shuḥḥa nafsihi fa-ulā-ika humul mufliḥūn

rows.arabic: إِن تُقْرِضُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا يُضَـٰعِفْهُ لَكُمْ وَيَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ شَكُورٌ حَلِيمٌ
rows.translation: If ye lend unto Allah a goodly loan, He will double it for you and will forgive you, for Allah is Responsive, Clement,
rows.transliteration: in tuqriḍullāha qarḍan ḥasanan yuḍā`ifhu lakum wayaghfir lakum ۚ wallāhu shakūrun ḥalīm

rows.translation: Knower of the Invisible and the Visible, the Mighty, the Wise.
